æ”¯æŒçš„ ``topic`` æ ¼å¼åŒ…æ‹¬ ``class_name:class``\ ã€\ ``class_method:class:method``\ ã€\ ``class_constant:class:constant``\ ã€\ ``class_signal:class:signal``\ ã€\ ``class_annotation:class:@annotation``\ ã€\ ``class_property:class:property`` å’Œ ``class_theme_item:class:item``\ ï¼Œå…¶ä¸­ ``class`` ä¸ºç±»åï¼Œ\ ``method`` ä¸ºæ–¹æ³•åï¼Œ\ ``constant`` ä¸ºå¸¸é‡åï¼Œ\ ``signal`` ä¸ºä¿¡å·åï¼Œ\ ``annotation`` ä¸ºæ³¨è§£åï¼Œ\ ``property`` ä¸ºå±æ€§åï¼Œ\ ``item`` ä¸ºä¸»é¢˜é¡¹ã€‚
